channel.title: The right stuff
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The right stuff" - Correct please

item.title: The right stuff
item.content:encoded:
Greetings.

When strolling the forum, I found this http://bvswiki.com/items:dark-draft it seems a Dark Draft can be made by mixing a Dark Mixture with The Right Stuff.. though this is not noted on The Right Stuff page.

Anyone willing to put it there ^^ thank you.
Arkantos
